name: External url as post Featured Image (thumbnail)
author: Puvox.software

sections.description:
[ ✅ 𝐒𝐄𝐂𝐔𝐑𝐄 𝐏𝐋𝐔𝐆𝐈𝐍𝐒 b𝓎 𝒫𝓊𝓋𝑜𝓍] :

• Revised for security to be reliable and free of vulnerability holes.
• Efficient, not to add any extra load/slowness to site.
• Don’t collect private data.

Plugin Description

Set External-URL as post thumbnail url.
(For developers: you can also use a filter-hook to programatically set/get external url as post’s thumbnail. Read more in plugin’s dashboard page)

Gutenberg not supported yet.

Feature: Youtube Thumbnails

This plugin has an additional option You can set youtube’s thumbnails as post’s featured image automatically ( Read more in plugin’s dashboard page) .

Available Options

See all available options and their description on plugin’s settings page.
sections.installation:
A) Enter your website “Admin Dashboard > Plugins > Add New” and enter the plugin name
or
B) Download plugin from WordPress.org , Extract the zip file and upload the container folder to “wp-content/plugins/”
sections.faq: • More at our WP plugins page.
